alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 1:36AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Defiance, Putnam, eastern Paulding, south central Henry, eastern Van Wert and Allen Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 134 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Paulding to near Alger. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ottoville and Delphos. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 119 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Defiance; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert
